snippet.title: Chopter Copter - Launch Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Itch.io download link:  sadfolks.itch.io/chopter-copter

Howling wind and pouring rain conceal King Vamperus as he propels through the night, assaulting the tower of the Elder Ones. Without their blood, King Vamperus and the Klah'kee people will surely wither to dust before the dawn...

...Thus, their endless dream would become a fable lost to history.

FEATURES:
- Control your copter using the Playdate's crank!
- Slice, dice, and weave through wacky weirdos!
- Juggle gibs and gyrate in jolly jubilation!
- Propel yourself to greatness and aim for the high score!
